title: Animalia Volatilia et Amphibia (Aier), volume IV
medium: 1 vol: ill: 70 drawings (incl.title page) in watercolor and gouache, with gold oval borders, on vellum, alternating with ms text on paper; 2 plates (LXX and LXXI) with gold border only
dimensions: page size (approximate): 14.3 x 18.4 cm (5 5/8 x 7 1/4 in.)
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Lessing J. Rosenwald
